sentence.Network_en: Pilferage in the warehouse reduces profitability by about two per cent.
sentence.Network_cn: 仓库中的失窃使利润损失了百分之二.

sentence.Network_en: Presumably, this redundancy reduces petty embezzlement and pilferage, albeit at staggering costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种繁琐的手续大概是为了防止贪污和小偷小摸, 却不管为此会付出多大的代价.

sentence.Network_en: Because transshipment adds expense as well as risk of damage and pilferage.
sentence.Network_cn: 转船会增加费用,另外还会增加偷窃、损坏的风险.
